centurio
Class GamePlayer

java.lang.Object
  centurio.NanoHTTPD
      centurio.AbstractGamePlayer
          centurio.GamePlayer

public class GamePlayer
extends AbstractGamePlayer

This class is responsible for starting a game, sending messages to the gamemaster and receiving them. The class also controls the end of a game and the behavior of the slaves.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Felix Maximilian Möller, Marius Schneider, Martin Wegner, University Dresden
